metadata.title: Tuesday, 19th April, 2016
metadata.session: FIFTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Vice President and Minister of Development Planning when the Government will repair the roofs, which were blown off in December, 2015, at the following schools in Chasefu Parliamentary Constituency
Minister of Lands, Natural Resources and Environmental Protection
parts: (a)    what the total hectarage of land allocated to Trident Kalumbila Mine in Solwezi West Parliamentary Constituency is;
(b)    how many people were negatively affected by the allocation of the land to the company;
(c)    how much money was paid to the people who were displaced by the mining company;
(d)    whether the affected people have been given alternative land for resettlement; and
(e)    if so, where the displaced people have been resettled.
(a)    when the Nakanyaa Secondary School in Nalikwanda Parliamentary Constituency, which was originally scheduled to open in May, 2015, will open;
(b)    what has caused the delay in opening the School; and

(c)    what measures have been taken to ensure that the School is opened according to the new schedule.
